definition: Holy Father/God the Father (in the Christian Trinity)

sentences.english: Saturday's attack occurred near that shrine and the Imam Abbas shrine.
sentences.chinese: 星期六的襲擊在那所聖祠和聖父阿訇聖祠附近發生。

sentences.english: It's not that 'Father Chavez' is always going to give us handouts.
sentences.chinese: ‘聖父查韋斯’並不總是給予我們施捨。

sentences.english: It has been understood that Cardinal Dias is in union with the Holy Father regarding Naju.
sentences.chinese: 它已瞭解到，迪亞斯樞機是在聯盟與聖父關於羅州。

definition: trustworthy/reliable/to believe something to be true
Abraham (name)/Abraham, father of Judaism and Islam in the Bible and Quran/same as Ibrahim 易卜拉辛
Holy Son/Jesus Christ/God the Son (in the Christian Trinity)
feudal term of praise for ruler, king or emperor/general term for saint in former times/term for God during the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom 太平天國|太平天国/Holy Spirit (in Christian Trinity)
